product_name: Maui Jim Sugar Beach Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Inspired by the pristine sands of Hawaii, Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses feature a rimless frame and contemporary aviator lenses for a classic look. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight, high-grade nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Frames and lenses are saltwater safe. Neutral gray lenses provide rich color and contrast in bright, direct sunlight. Adjustable rubber nose pads prevent slippage. Anti-corrosive, stainless-steel pin hinges ensure durability. Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses come with a semirigid case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Inspired by the pristine sands of Hawaii, Maui Jim Sugar Beach polarized sunglasses feature a rimless frame and contemporary aviator lenses for a classic look.
